title.rendered: Royale Realtors India | South Delhi’s Top Luxury Real Estate Agents

content.rendered:
Looking To Buy or Rent a Property?
Find Your Dream Home With Us!

South Delhi's Top Real Estate Agents

Royale Realtors India is a luxury real estate company. We help High Networth Individuals, Top Industrialists, NRIs, MNCs, and Investors by offering Personalised Real Estate bouquets services in Prime Locations of SOUTH DELHI through Premium Luxury Listings of high-end Properties, like Villas, Land, Apartments, builder floors, flats, bungalows, duplexes, triplexes or Offices.

Founded In 1990, We’ve spent decades excelling in the competitive landscape of South Delhi real estate, establishing a class reputation as expert advisors serving boutique-style solutions to a niche clientele. Our business is built on communication, dedication, and transparency.

The processes we have mastered have helped us to rise to the level of the best real estate consultants In South Delhi. With our sharp knowledge of the local market, We’ve helped over 500 families & many multinational companies in South Delhi find their desired properties, and We are confident we can help you find yours too, or in your family or for your organization.

Clients Testimonials

Sushmita Bedi Designer

Recently we had the pleasure of working with Royale Realtors India. From the initial meeting to discuss the sale of our property, through the staging and marketing advice and final sale, we felt informed, supported and constantly in the loop of how everything was going. The professionalism of every member of the team, friendliness and commitment to getting the best sale for us, was second to none. We are delighted with the result they achieved for our family and the experience of working with Lalit and the team. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them or work with them again. I can see how they have achieved the reputation they have and why they are so well regarded for the work they do. Thank you all for your hard work.

Dr. Amrit Juneja Doctor

We had a good experience buying our first home with Royale Realtors India. We dealt primarily with Lalit who was great. Always friendly, helpful, transparent and professional. His communication were on point - regular without being overbearing. Every time I had questions for Lalit, he responded quickly and fully. Thank you for your great service.

Rajesh Manglani Businessman

Sold - 4 BHK Apartment I chose Royale Realtors India because they had done such a great job for my daughter and her partner previously and I wasn't disappointed. The property went on the market just about the time that the market was slowing down, sales were taking longer and Covid was rampant. Despite all this Lalit persevered and helped the potential buyers see the benefits of the property. I cannot recommend them highly enough for getting me a fair price in today's market. If you use them you wont be disappointed by their enthusiasm and perseverance.

Aditya Chauhan NRI

Best Real Estate Team with Outstanding Knowledge! I was new to home buying. Lalit was professional and personal! He never made me feel uncomfortable and helped me every step of the way! He explained everything in a way that was easy to understand from the making the offer, getting to know the property market, to working with the insurance. Very friendly, experienced and helpful agent. Highly recommend him and his team.

Namrata Sen Investor

I cannot recommend them highly enough. They are my go to people for everything Real Estate. It is pretty rare to come across Real Estate agents with their professionalism and knowledge and also an Agent who does everything they say they are going to do. They made the whole real estate investment process stress free and easy for me.
